Text: First, DeLtA_Sn1p3r, thank you for this upload. You're a god amongst rats for this. However, would you consider putting together a detailed set of instructions for installing this? The included instructions are a bit vague. Cheers!
Got Up and Running with Ableton Live 9?

Just Run Setup And Go To Options / Prefrences 
Turn Off Update Adjust Settings In Prefrences 
Movie Library To Were You Want Add Live Packs To Library Open 9 Double Click On Packs After you find them in drop down menu of live 9 to the left and add samples and loops if downloaded to library or desktop as long as you can find everything you should be good

Very nice upload, seeding it to death. All WAS great, until it suddenly didn't want to save anymore. I downloaded it and everything was good but I needed to authorize. Then earlier today everything worked. I could save and everything. Than after a few hours, I needed to authorize. Help would be appreciated
Hi !! It's working for me but I can't use Ableton 9 as a rewire to cubase! Why?
